tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonderful experience with Forever 32 dental team. Underwent treatment for a wisdom teeth issue. Dr.Shilpi and Dr Ashwin clearly explained the problem and the treatment to be taken.The wisdom tooth pulled out was not that painful .After the treatment, they called me to check about my health and advised me to take proper medication. Thanks to both Dr.Shilpi and Dr Ashwin . I wish  if i can give them more than 5 starts . Highly recommended Forever 32 for dental issues

Hospital infrastructure was very good and spacious. Doctor was calm in hearing my problems and offering treatment options. Had to do couple of extractions and did the procedure with little to no pain. He also did regular follow ups to check upon me which is a first from an Indian doctor. Definitely recommend
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback..!!

review: Amazing!  The professionalism and friendliness of the doctor and the team is outstanding and so Patiency while the entire treatment . The doctor explains things apparent and concisely about my situation, the recovery process, and my role in the rehab process. Appointment times are convenient for my schedule.
